title: [Sloop, Main Deck]
description: Beneath a single mast the freshly swabbed wooden planking, stretching from the fore to the quarter deck, glints in the daylight.  Large coils of hemp rope are neatly stacked between some cannons on either side of the main deck, while a rectangular sail snaps in the salty seabreeze overhead.  A rusty knife protrudes from the railing next to a slender gangplank.
